trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties for writing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />를 쓰기 위한 메서드 및 속성을 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method in order to obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer for adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> 메서드를 가져오기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> 추가 하기 위한 기록기 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 콘텐츠를 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />에 새 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />을 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: A writer for outputting the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 새 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />를 출력하기 위한 작성기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The image type to write.
trans-unit.target: 작성할 이미지 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" />에 대해 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> 이미지를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" />의 새 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 `imageType` 수도 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Only one thumbnail image can represent the document sequence as a whole (although individual documents and pages can have their own thumbnail images).
trans-unit.target: (하지만 개별 문서와 페이지에 자신의 축소판 이미지를 가질 수 있습니다) 하나만 축소판 이미지는 문서 시퀀스 전체를 나타낼 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> is called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> already has a thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 없으면 예외가 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> 될 때 호출 됩니다는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> 미리 보기에 이미 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Flushes and closes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> writer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> 작성기를 플러시하고 닫습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> method to flush and close the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> 플러시하고 닫는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> 기록기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: 작성될 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />에 대한 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents a default printing configuration for the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 시퀀스의 기본 인쇄 구성을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정가 유효성을 검사 하거나 수정 하지 지정 된 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> 특정 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: 필요한 경우 사용 하십시오는 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> 만드는 메서드를 한 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-특정 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> 지정 된 프린터에 유효 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> 연결할 속성은 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> 와 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: 작성할 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> 는 기록 됩니다.
